name: Ice Road Truck Racing ( Best Truckers Race game for Holidays in winter season )
name_original: Ice Road Truck Racing ( Best Truckers Race game for Holidays in winter season )
description:
Ice Road Truck Racing is a challenging truck driving game where you have to Race your massive 18 Wheeler truck under various (and increasingly difficult) circumstances On Ice Roads. If you are a truck enthusiast or have ever wondered how they manage these huge monsters, try this game! It requires precision driving skills and endless patience to succeed.
So what are we waiting for?
Take on the exhilaratingly steep slopes of these huge mountain cliffs with huge trucks and perform tricks to Impress your opponents . The aim of the game is to reach the finishing line before your opponents do!

* Addictive as hell, start easy and progress
* Awesome 3D graphics and amazing gameplay
* Easy to control -
Enjoy this realistic experience
